author: USA TODAY, Molly Stellino, USA TODAY
title: Fact check: Herd immunity would not fully stop the spread of coronavirus
description: Although herd immunity may eventually be achieved, through vaccination or outbreak, other factors help stop respiratory diseases like COVID-19.
content:
Vice President Mike Pence defended the administration's current coronavirus testing plan, saying the United States has the capacity "to do a sufficient amount of testing for states to move into Phase 1." (April 17)
AP Domestic
